website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPhone 6 is the right iPhone at the right size, and one of the few unlocked phones that can be used on any of the four major U.S. carriers.
pros: Universal carrier compatibility in the United States
Best third-party apps of any mobile OS
cons: Phone calling performance is just okay

customer_reviews.title: Faulty battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 'refurbished' option for £290. Phone arrived in seemingly good condition but with a faulty battery that causes the phone to die at 40%. Heading to the Apple Store for advice on what to do. UPDATE: Apple ran a diagnostics and found the battery was 'consumed'. Cost me £80 for a replacement, absolutely appalling that the vendor does not check a simple thing like battery condition before selling on their phones to consumers as so called refurbished, I urge everyone to avoid them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Apple do not recognise the device as new
customer_reviews.text: The mechanics of purchase, delivery and the the telephone itself were all fine, great value and easily 4 stars. However the 3-star rating reflects the fact that Apple will not recognise the device as new (having previously been registered as sold to the third party selling the mobile) and consequently the standard warranty and AppleCare are not available.
customer_reviews.author: JimG

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE UNPROFESSIONAL !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Listed as PROFESSIONALLY REVERBED item arrived with faulty battery would not charge above 18% had to source new battery locally tried contacting seller several times no answer ( Robotic machine with 5 options none of which answered ) very least would have expected working devise BUYERS BEWARE !!!!! Latest on seller NOW SPEAKER NOT WORKING Cannot hear calls ect Eventually contacted me only after getting above review I wanted problem resolved ( ie Working phone ) said they would get back to me that was 2 days ago DISGUSTING. !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is poor, I had to get the camera changed
customer_reviews.text: Really unimpressed with the problems I've had with the refurb iphone I received. The battery life is poor, I had to get the camera changed, home button replaced and there's problems with the sound recording, so siri doesn't work. I'm now being faced with a faulty screen which has become unresponsive. It is exceptionally slow and always has been, but I still have lots of storage available. I have now had it for almost a year, so it's not under warranty and I've already paid for previous repairs. If you're lucky with a refurb you could be fine, but be aware you could get one like mine...
customer_reviews.author: ImogenR

customer_reviews.title: Defective IPhone 6.
customer_reviews.text: Phone worked ok for 2 weeks . Then battery showed 100% charged and phoned just switched off . Switched on again automatically sometimes showing 10-20% charged . Phone charge never moved off 100% charged but battery just went flat and phone switched off . Returned phone . Got refund but would have preferred replacement . Bought the phone " As new"
customer_reviews.author: Sedick Kalam

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I didn't write a review but bought this about a year ago, was as advertised, worked perfectly, uses for a few months and gave it to my sister who is still using it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Solomons

customer_reviews.title: Fairly quick delivery, good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Item came well wrapped and in near pristine condition. (minor scratches on the screen that you really have to look for to see.) iPhone came partially set up and was NOT at the activation screen when I powered the device on. After a reset it appears to be locked to o2, this isn’t a problem but the advert does say unlocked. I think this may be why the device came partially activated....
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Utter disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to give any stars but have to. Utterly disappointed. My daughter waited patiently for Christmas to finally get her iPhone. Imagine the disappointment she feels as it doesn’t work properly. The battery is next to useless. It’s very hard to charge, these are all perfectly good chargers that charge up other iPhones and devices in the family, so the chargers are not faulty. The battery has never charged more than 50% and once it gets to 11% it dies instantly. I’ve contacted the company and am awaiting a reply. I want a refund. I shall return and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Happycustomer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty batteries
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this phone in july. After a while the battery started playing up, before long it wouldn't hold a charge at all and would die suddenly at 80% battery. I sent it away and after about 2 weeks i recieved a replacement. This one lasted a bit longer but now will only charge if you hold it just right. I've tried multiple chargers so I'm sure it can only be a sub standard battery. Advertised as 1 year warrenty when purchased but now battery is only covered for 3 months. 2 new phones in 6 months. Absolute joke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a new phone but the nearly £700 price tag put me right off so I decided to go for a refurbished phone at a third of the price. My phone came in an Apple box with new headphones and charger. I have had the phone since August and so far so good. I would certainly buy from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: KIT GADGETS: small dents on back of phone, screen coming out on corner which makes hard to tap on top left, small white blot on center of screen, lots of scratches at bottom (near speaker), battery often runs out when on high percentage then later comes on, phone started to recently charge very slow then run out fast. definitely seems like its not refurbished! do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: L.Shaw

customer_reviews.title: good value phone for small price
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished phone. In great condition, couple of minor stuffs on corners but works perfectly. I find this iPhone much easier to use than the androids I've been used to. No turning back now, will continue using iPhone's and the same supplier, they have a fantastic customer service. 5 stars all the way.... thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sue.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a Christmas present for my son's. The reason I bought these was because it said they were unlocked. Christmas Day we found out they were not unlocked. We had to pay to find out the network they were locked to and then pay someone to unlock them. Wasn't impressed with that. But overall the phone works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle lee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this looks ok but had to replace screen and battery to get it to work properly would have sent it back but spent ages transferring stuff from old phone
customer_reviews.author: linda link

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases i ever made. The seller was incredibly good and when we had a fault on the phone they dealt with & ended up replacing so quickly. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Miss C.

customer_reviews.title: Phone is in great condition. Has a few scratches here and there ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone is in great condition. Has a few scratches here and there but nothing too bad. There is one scratch on the camera lenses but it doesn't seem to affect the item's quality. Only one problem with the screen which is turning off and on on its own and it's like I'm pressing something even when it's resting in my pocket. Currently discussing with the store to see if something can be done. Quick response from them too!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Spitale

customer_reviews.title: Needs a repair already
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Phone screen in a couple of the corners is visible it has been removed and colour a little faded. Glass has cracked (with a case on) within the week from the point the screen is faded.
customer_reviews.author: David Tresidder

customer_reviews.title: He says it is brilliant and it's great to have a bigger screen area ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas to replace his iPhone 5 as teenagers live for their phones!!! He says it is brilliant and it's great to have a bigger screen area and it is so clear. Would highly recommend it to anyone. Maybe time I look at an upgrade from my iPhone 4s!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Tea

customer_reviews.title: Wifi & Bluetooth failed within a month
customer_reviews.text: Wifi & Bluetooth failed within a month, then crashes to a completely dead phone for hours even with charger plugged in. Suppliers only give 14 day warranty & refused my return within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my dad very good condition no scratches. Works well not had any problems had for the for around 7-8months now still ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, did not come with Charger plug
customer_reviews.text: Came within a week of order, had to take to mobile company to activate sim minor issue. Highly recommend, did not come with Charger plug, only wire.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Furyy

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing for the the price they'er selling.
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone was amazing. It worked perfectly and the seller description matched with the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Ditesh

customer_reviews.title: Good solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Phone delivered very quickly & exactly as described by the seller. Thinner, brighter screen, battery life seems better & lots of storage as well. Happy purchaser.
customer_reviews.author: Lost Paddler

customer_reviews.title: Ok to start with but died in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived after a bit of a wait and was as expected. Unfortunately it overheated and died 6 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tjp Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: The sellers never mentioned that the screen had been cheaply replaced, making the home button stop working. I was unable to use the home button on this phone. The battery life is terrible, and when my phone dies it does not turn on for another few days.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: OK for a grandchild who only wanted an Apple iphone
customer_reviews.text: She hasn't made any negative comments. Must be ok cos I cant get her away from it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This phone arrived, wouldn’t hold its charge and wouldn’t turn on. Tried with other chargers as advised. Have now returned the product and been waiting nearly a week for the replacement to arrive, no communication since sending back the handset. Only a replacement offered not a refund although product not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: clare

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife as a surprise, really happy with the phone, works great and very happy with condition.
customer_reviews.author: olly

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Should have made it clear in the description that phone is locked.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline F.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware: no headphones or plug
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with Norway's Customs, they initially asked for the receipt/invoice. Didn't like the fact that I didn't come with the plug for the USB cord and specially the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: CKF

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This was a very difficult phone to use. I sent it back it it absoluty refused to verify anything. Mean I g you could not get apps, I tunes or connect to cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: husband well pleased and arrived when we were told and in good ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the label, husband well pleased and arrived when we were told and in good condition. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it second hand and have used it for about a year and a half. Looks like it will last for a few more years yet. You know what you're getting if you're familiar with apple, great phone but mixed battery life (lasts about a day and a half mostly with moderate use).
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ponsonby

customer_reviews.title: it was fine. Tried this phone yesterday and it didn’t work ...
customer_reviews.text: It has difficulties connecting to the internet, it has kind of a delayed reaction. It seems to find some websites and email quicker via 4G. As an example, I used to use my old phone as a sat nav with google maps, it was fine. Tried this phone yesterday and it didn’t work at all, it just wouldn’t keep up. Also, a lot scratches on the all case. I will return my one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandwood Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: I still have it and working fine. Enjoing every second
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. M. Joliet Jake

customer_reviews.title: A good quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Love The phone ,good quality,easy to use,just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: 1927 COLIN

customer_reviews.title: this is such a great improvement, love it
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an iPhone 4, this is such a great improvement, love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gosling

customer_reviews.title: Very worn looking
customer_reviews.text: The phone was in a very worn condition it wouldn’t have said it was in very good condition at all as discribed
customer_reviews.author: Jean  Morton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! iPhones rule! Works perfectly. Price is awesome. Grab it!
customer_reviews.author: V. Bor

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen not working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as present , touch screen not working , asked to return it , they refused as 30 days warranty ? Yet they replied to someone it had 12 month warranty ( do not buy
customer_reviews.author: mr Matthew newton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very please with my iPhone 6. Listed on invoice as in Prestine Condition and agree. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovepugs

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Description said “good” but the phone is immaculate! Quick delivery. Really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in very good condition. All features worked perfectly. Bought for my son, and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Yaw Darkwah

customer_reviews.title: Like new and was a great Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Very please with the phone! Like new and was a great Christmas present. Highly reccomend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: heidi wellstead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly quick delivery. Phone exactly as described- unlocked with charger and charge lead etc and all in as new condition. Perfect! Price was reasonable given the phone's pristine condition. Will gladly use this seller again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ryeguy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This phone was like new I don’t know how you can sell them so cheap very pleased thanks .B Walker.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Volume Limited
customer_reviews.text: The volume is very low, preference is to use mobile, because even when earpiece setting is up full, conversation is difficult with a little background noise. Would not purchase another, or though the intent was to purchase a second to make a pair in the house hold
customer_reviews.author: David Modley

customer_reviews.title: Battery is dreadful
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed after receiving this phone the body work is in very good condition but the battery life is dreadful with a complete charge within an hour the phone is down to 20% I’ve also experienced problems receiving text messages
customer_reviews.author: Clare Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very limited life
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone in feb 2018 . 6 months later the touch screen started to fail. Repair was done in Nov, but only few later failing of touch screen started again and before reaching 12 months the screen was completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: METTE KAARSBO

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible phone I got it 'used like new' the battery drains from 100% to 20% in a matter of minutes and it keeps restarting automatically continuously until the phone dies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great phone to say only 1GB ram and good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with everything in the box like described and was in brilliant condition
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything in the box like described and was in brilliant condition. It was unlocked as I could use my giffgaff sim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a useless battery, with very little us it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a useless battery, with very little us it does not last even half a day ! it is also much slower in doing anything than my much older lesser model.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sprawson

customer_reviews.title: was easy to set up and is in amazing condition
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone as a Christmas present, arrived well packaged, was easy to set up and is in amazing condition. I would defiantly recommended. (I’m using it to write this review right now).
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not visually brand new
customer_reviews.text: Review based on visual appearance only, bought this for £200 and there are several scratches and dents around the edges and on the back, once a case is on they are not visable, however the screen is in perfect condition, not ideal but thats what you get for a refurbished phone.
customer_reviews.author: Reece Pemble

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Functions well. Good condition. Minor scratch marks on the back as described in the ad. Battery life OK. All else works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described, worked straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amecole

customer_reviews.title: Speaker does not work when calling
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was excellent however the phone itself has mechanical problems. The speaker does not work when calling people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty battery.
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, this was supposed to be refurbished and the battery is in poor condition. It can be fully charged and die after literally 15 minutes usage. I'd avoid this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very good reburished I phone 6
customer_reviews.text: The phone was just how it was described and boxed with all the accessories as described
customer_reviews.author: Russ Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, looks like new as said... great deal with no bad surprise !
customer_reviews.author: Léo

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend buying anything from this seller at all
customer_reviews.text: Definitely this iphone does not work, in two months the screen started to fail, does not respond to the touch screen, the first day I could not hear from the microphone properly, and now at all and sometimes the screen blinks and turns black. I do not recommend buying anything from this seller at all. It's the closest thing to a scam I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... got it for a friend and she is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a friend and she is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Jean Blundell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use but the client is very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinto P. M. Da Costa

customer_reviews.title: Faulty phone
customer_reviews.text: Had about a month then iphone started heating up went so hot you could not hold it switched it’s self off then would not turn back on toke phone to Apple store Genius Bar to be told phone is faulty wish I had read other reviews from seller be careful w ould not buy from seller again
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Baird

customer_reviews.title: They said it would arrive in 2-3 days, it ...
customer_reviews.text: They said it would arrive in 2-3 days, it arrived the next morning. They said it would have a few scratches and marks? It was immaculate, looked brand new and working perfectly. Thank you very much, i will definitely be buying my next phone from here!
customer_reviews.author: r.b.middleton

customer_reviews.title: Phone looks great, bought it for my wife 4 week ago
customer_reviews.text: Phone looks great, bought it for my wife 4 week ago. The only problem is that the ringing signal stopped working. Have to see if I get some support from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Poor product support
customer_reviews.text: Battery failure after only 6 months out with 3 month warranty with product. Renewal cost of battery and associated damage made this a very poor buy. Amazon a~z guarantee useless. Beware this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not work properly very disappointed I will have to spend money to get it checked
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at fair price. Phone has worked faultlessly for years now
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and very good condition, not had a problem with it at all! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent used iPhone's
customer_reviews.text: Hello I'm very happy with the iPhone very good quality for used,so good I bought two Excellent customer service And very quick delivery Thankyou so much
customer_reviews.author: wyn james lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son loves his phone came on time good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The delivery Took longer than expected although my money was returned for this. The phone was as stated pristine condition looks and works fantastically. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect was just as described and well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Im actually suprised. I got no headphones but thatd fine. It was cheap and the iphone works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sheyna liddelow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and the condition of the phone is really ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service and the condition of the phone is really good when advertised as acceptable, so impressed I've ordered another for my daughter. The inclusion of a cover, screen protector, ear phones and charging cable are a nice touch 👍
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this phone for chrismas at a very reasonable price ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone for chrismas at a very reasonable price it came in the post promptly and meets all my expectations that you would expect when buying considering it was not purchased from Amazon but through Amazon by a different company I was extremely impressed with the service I received would defiantly use again
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Finn

customer_reviews.title: Bought this phone for my partner had to send it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my partner had to send it back cause it was crashing and doing what it wanted and I still haven't had a update to tell me what's happening with the item just waiting for my money back
customer_reviews.author: Linda burtob

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful phone, works perfectly in conjunction with my Apple ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone, works perfectly in conjunction with my Apple Sport Watch. Have put my iPhone 5 away, it's totally redundant.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Powel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cam wit it locked so now have to pay £50 to get it unlocked 😬
customer_reviews.author: samantha lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life...
customer_reviews.text: Phone was in a good condition but nowhere in the description before purchasing did it mention the poor battery life so i had to purchase a new one...
customer_reviews.author: karen harwood

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, crap accessories
customer_reviews.text: Phone is good condition and have had no problems, cable broke pretty quickly, plug doesn't work and the earphones are cheap copies with bad sound.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, my son is really pleased with it. Was listed as acceptable condition so wasn’t expecting it to look as good as it did
customer_reviews.author: Linz p

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good refurbished iPhone. My dad is still using it for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wifi connection in my house wifi is so poor, although other devices works with it
customer_reviews.text: First, it was locked although it was sold as sim free. second, sim insert part was broken and could not be opened. Third, wifi connection in my house wifi is so poor, although other devices works with it.
customer_reviews.author: sanae s.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: On arrival this phone wouldn't register any networks and the battery was faulty. Seller accepted return straight away but have heard nothing back since.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Top seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money , what a surprise I got when there was a gel case and a screen protector , I would recommend this seller to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it so far, met the expectations after 2 months of use. The only con is that the screen freezes eventually having to lock and unlock the phone, but order than that works very good.
customer_reviews.author: JOMASFEL

customer_reviews.title: Very good condition, however battery life is average
customer_reviews.text: The iphone was in extremely good conditions and its nice that they give you 1 year guarantee. Nevertheless the battery life is average, not like a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great service and product!
customer_reviews.text: Came as new, boxed. Tested, all working as it should. Prestine with charger, cable and pin
customer_reviews.author: R STYLES

customer_reviews.title: It is working perfectly well, and it is just ...
customer_reviews.text: It is working perfectly well, and it is just as described. The only test that I have left for it is the durability test, and for that, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Nakina

customer_reviews.title: Useless within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 weeks of purchase the phone has completely failed and is absolutely useless. It will not boot nor will it accept any restore protocols recommended by Apple. Avoid at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Piper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in all areas
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition my hubby, who is a technophobe found it easy to use, was well protected by good packaging
customer_reviews.author: ivyp

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Phone in good cosmetic order but battery is jumping up and down in charge... could last all day or 20mins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product. SUPER fast delivery. Came with brand new charger and Apple case. So happy with what I got for the price! Amazing service! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: *NOT UNLOCKED*
customer_reviews.text: the phone is in mint condition which is good, problem is that it isnt unlocked like described so now have to splash more money on getting it unlocked, not very happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Meaney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good condition no marks or scratches. My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Fake phone
customer_reviews.text: Just found out that my NEW I PHONE 6 is actually 4 years old has non genuine parts and even some small bits missing Apple don't want to touch it as it's in bad condition
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phones & service
customer_reviews.text: Used these twice now . Really really good phones arrived. Very surprised . Not a mark on them . Definitely recommend and I’ll definitely use again
customer_reviews.author: MISS M E HENDRY

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 6 Space Grey 64GB (UK Version) SIM-Free Smartphone
product_meta.description:
iPhone 6 isn't simply bigger - it's better in every way. Larger, yet dramatically thinner. More powerful, but remarkably power efficient. With a smooth metal surface that seamlessly meets our most advanced Multi-Touch display. It's a new generation of iPhone that's better by any measure.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
2 Months return to base warranty

BOX CONTAINS
Device
Quick Start Guide
Headphones
USB cable
Transfer cable
SIM card removal tool
User manual
Charger

See more
feature_bullets: iPhone 6 isn’t just bigger — it’s better in every way.
An A8 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture.
A new 8MP iSight camera with Focus Pixels.
The Touch ID fingerprint identity sensor.
All in a 6.9mm thin seamless design.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
